list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: having an even and regular surface or consistency; free from perceptible projections, lumps, or indentations.

list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the trucks gave a smooth ride
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Những chiếc xe tải đã cho một chuyến đi suôn sẻ

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: (of an action, event, or process) without problems or difficulties.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the group's expansion into the U.S. market was not quite so smooth
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Việc mở rộng của nhóm vào thị trường Hoa Kỳ không quá mượt mà

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: (of a person or their manner, actions, or words) suavely charming in a way considered to be unctuous.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: giọng nói của anh ấy rất mịn màng

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: (of food or drink) without harshness or bitterness.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: a lovely, smooth, very fruity wine
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Một loại rượu đáng yêu, mịn, rất trái cây

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: give (something) a flat, regular surface or appearance by running one's hand over it.
in a way that is without difficulties.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the course of true love never did run smooth
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Quá trình của tình yêu đích thực không bao giờ chạy trơn tru
